t: Under Canvas Partners With Small Luxury Hotels of the World™ (SLH) as First Outdoor Hospitality Brand in its Esteemed Collection - Under Canvas®
s: November 29, 2023 - NEW YORK, NY. (Nov. 29, 2023) – Today, Under Canvas, the leader in upscale, outdoor hospitality, and Small Luxury Hotels of the World (SLH) – a prestigious collection of over 540 independently spirited luxury hotels across the globe – announced a partnership between the two brands.
